column1: Source: USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference 28 slightly revised May 2016 Software v.3.7 2017-02-01
Nutrient data for: 15057, Fish, ocean perch, Atlantic, raw

(a)"Samples were obtained from 12 retail stores using a probability-based sampling plan.  Some fish had been treated during processing to retain moisture on thawing.  Untreated fish = 75 mg sodium/100g."
